regnum.short_description: Fight monsters, collect XP, craft battleaxes, armor, guns and lots more.

stella.short_description: You start on a small island and your goal is to enlarge it.

reject.short_description: Simply reject all login attempts and show them a message

fogblox.short_description: Work in Progress. game of the fog

cellestial_game.short_description: Game of Life in three dimensions.

devtest.short_description: Testing environment for engine or mod development.

exile.short_description: Challenging, at times brutal, wilderness survival with simple technology.

jail_escape.short_description: Work in Progress. Escape the Jail! Don't get caught!

ssp.short_description: Imagine being alone. In a spacecraft. This is you.

extra_ordinance.short_description: You have several weapons to choose from. You can dig through the earth. So can they.

lazarr.short_description: Be a pirate and solve laser puzzles (UNFINISHED!)

proxima_survival.short_description: Survival on Proxima Centauri B. Not working on it now.

blank.short_description: Absolute blank template to start your projects from.

colorlandia.short_description: 🎨 21 colorful biomes to explore, much more than 256 colorful nodes to create whatever you imagine. 🌈

occupymoon_game.short_description: Work in Progress. This game will send you to the moon!

screwdriver2.short_description: A more intuitive node rotation tool

toolcrafter.short_description: use any posible material craft tool in crafttable

caps_alert.short_description: Catches chat messages with all-caps and warns / kicks players.

crowbar.short_description: Adds two crowbars as unbreakable multitools.

drinks.short_description: Adds a juice press and two juice storage containers.

regenerative_ores.short_description: Adds regenerative ores to the game, allowing players to mine and gather resources without depleting them. Specifically for FFA Skywars games.

time_travel.short_description: Adds in a craftable time machine that can be used to time travel to different time periods of Earth's history.

tungsten_carbide.short_description: Adds tools made from tungsten carbide that are more durable.

ancient_ice_stuff.short_description: Adds a new powerful ore to the game

strange_weapons.short_description: Adds many strange and improbable weapons

adaptation_modpack.short_description: Key based adaptation database of items.

appliances.short_description: API for create appliances in other mods powered by technic, mesecons or hand.

cemeteries.short_description: Generate graves and cemeteries in world. For Luanti 5.12 and newer.

chair_lift.short_description: Add craftable and usable chair lift. TIPS: Use gearbox, grease parts (hemp oil), check grease with inspect tool, combine more engines...

feed_buckets.short_description: Craftable bucket of feeds which can be used for feed nearby animals.

hades_grass_divot.short_description: Add new posiblity for spreading grass with use of garden throwel.

hades_skinsdb.short_description: Custom player skins manager with support for 1.0 and 1.8er skins and inventory skins selector for Hades Revisited

hades_snow.short_description: Add snow to Hades Revisited via snow cannon.

moretools.short_description: Add more variant of screwdriver and shears (if vines is enabled).  Add garden trowel tool if composting is enabled.

one_death.short_description: This allows players to die only once. The world can be destroyed after it (default for single-player) or the player can lose privileges to interact with the world and others (default for multi-player)

pole_scaffolding.short_description: Craftable pole scaffoldings. Support default game and Hades Revisited game.

power_generators.short_description: Add power generators based on appliances API.

rope_bridges.short_description: Buildable rope bridge. Should be used with moreblocks or hades_moreblocks.

mcl2_clocks.short_description: just an adjustable redstone clock, thanks to neocraft1293

i_have_hands.short_description: Carry nodes/blocks with inventories without breaking them.

everness.short_description: Adds many new biomes, items and blocks.

spawners.short_description: Adds spawners for mobs, dungeons, temples and ores.

x_bows.short_description: Adds bow and arrows with API.

x_bows_extras.short_description: Adds more bows/guns and arrows to Minetest using X Bows API.

x_farming.short_description: Farming with new plants, crops, trees, ice fishing, bees, candles, scarecrow, crates, composter, bonemeal, ropes, pies...

staffranks.short_description: Adds ranks, in chat and in nametag.

areas.short_description: Areas is a advanced area protection mod based on node_ownership.

caverealms.short_description: A mod for Minetest to add underground realms.

fireflies.short_description: Adds fireflies which can be caught in a net and placed in bottles for lighting.

name_hider.short_description: Minetest mod to hide player names

server_news.short_description: Minetest mod to show server news when players join

under_sky.short_description: Skybox switch for really dark Minetest caves

blockhead.short_description: Lets you put a block on your head.

growdrygrass.short_description: Makes dry grass spread on savanna dirt.

objectuuids.short_description: Work in Progress. Assigns a persistent UUID to every object.

rivets.short_description: Adds rivets for decoration or locking blocks.

subtitles.short_description: Adds on-screen subtitles for sound effects.

cozylights.short_description: Work in Progress. Early alpha. Improves the way light sources(torches etc) behave and allows to create huge lights, literal projectors with just a mouse click, light map will be computed for you.

touch.short_description: Orient yourself in the darkness by touch.

ebiomes_dyes.short_description: Deprecated because after ebiomes v1.5.0, dye recipes are included by default, making this unnecessary. Adds dye recipes for the flowers from Extra Biomes.

grass_string.short_description: Adds string made from grass, which can be converted into normal string.

archaeology.short_description: Adds an looting and API in archaeologing

chromakey.short_description: Adds an chroma blocks for videos or photoshop.

fire_extinguisher.short_description: Adds fire extinguisher, which can extinguish some fire

mcl_rose_gold.short_description: This adds a new tier of tools and armor, as well as some decorative blocks. Like gold but last longer and in pink!

locked_travelnet.short_description: Protect travelnet stations with locks and/or passwords

locks.short_description: Shared chests, doors, furnaces and signs - with keys

mobf_trader.short_description: Configurable mobs/NPC which can trade for you.

npc_talk_edit.short_description: Edit ingame what NPCs say without server restart

plasterwork.short_description: Add colored plaster coats to nodes

corngirl.short_description: Work in Progress. adds a creepy cornfield, with a dark secret...

coreanim.short_description: Interpolated animation modpack, using Luanti 5.9+ API with backwards compatible syntax.

beacons.short_description: Adds craftable beacons in several different colors.

bunker.short_description: Add blast proof concrete and its craft items.

s_potions_modpack.short_description: Adds a simple potion brewing system for MTG. Includes API for adding custom potions.

industrious.short_description: Adds new industrious-themed blocks and tools.

nextgen_compass.short_description: A compass item which points towards the world origin.

nextgen_tinted_glass.short_description: Adds tinted glass that doesn't allow light to pass through

spyglass.short_description: Adds the ability to zoom in via a Spyglass

floating_anchor.short_description: ExtraUtilities' Angel Block for Minecraft in Minetest! Place structures in mid-air with ease.

plasticbox.short_description: Adds a recolourable plastic box. Fork of @cheapie's version with improvements.

item_physics.short_description: Makes items lay flat on the ground and not spin.

mfsm.short_description: Allows for multple states to be active, while maintaining typical state machine behavior. Good for gamestate and mobs.

sum_air_currents.short_description: Adds wind and air currents which can push objects and players.

sum_airship.short_description: Adds a simple airship for getting around the floatlands. Also optionally uses air currents.

sum_parachute.short_description: Adds parachutes. These are reusable but require you to craft to pack the parachute into your bag.

postool.short_description: Adds a HUD to show current ingame time and position also tool to visualize map-blocks

exile_songs.short_description: CC0 music tracks that play while you're playing Exile. Permits and will play any ogg vorbis sounds you put in the sounds folder!

mcl_better_end.short_description: Make the end better in Mineclonia and Mineclone!

mobs_api.short_description: Work in Progress. Provides a simple API for mobs

colorful_beds.short_description: Adds the other 14 colors to the simple and fancy beds

dynamic_trees.short_description: Adds trees that can grow dynamically

ore_deposits.short_description: Adds ore deposits that can randomly spawn on stone

ambience.short_description: Adds realistic sound effects into your world.

beds.short_description: beds which allows sleep, featured to (auto) skip the night.

bees.short_description: This mod adds bees and beehives into minetest

ethereal.short_description: Adds many new biomes, items and mechanics into the world.

lucky_block.short_description: Craft and break lucky blocks to give something good, bad or painful :)

mobs_slimes.short_description: Add green and lava slimes to your world.

nssb.short_description: BIOME integration for nssm, the not so simple buildings.

nssm.short_description: Adds a host of creatures into your world with new weapons too.

playerplus.short_description: Adds effects to player to change speeds, cause damage, knockback and more...

protector.short_description: Lets players craft special blocks to protect their builds or disable PVP in areas.

regrow.short_description: Helps to regrow tree fruits instead of replanting saplings.

sfinv_home.short_description: Adds HOME tab to SF Inventory to set and go to player home point

stairs.short_description: Adds more stair types to Minetest.

teleport_potion.short_description: Adds craftable teleport potions (throwable) and teleport pads.

islands.short_description: lua mapgen featuring tropical islands and vast ocean

waterfalls.short_description: Adds water erosion, so flowing water forms somewhat more realistic looking waterfalls.

wildlife.short_description: Adds some wild animals that interact with each other.

climate.short_description: Not every biome is the same and neither should their weather be. The complete weather bundle for any game.

regional_weather.short_description: A weather pack for Climate API

gocm_carbon.short_description: Adds various charcoal related items such as a Marvelous Hammer to Compress things, New Gear, New Diamonds, Charcoal and Willow Charcoal.

compression.short_description: Uses compression_api to generate compressed nodes.

compression_pack.short_description: A bundle of the mods that generate certain compressed nodes.

portability.short_description: Adds portable things to MineClone (crafting table, ender chest, enchanting table)

pine_generator.short_description: Allows you to make stylish pins

mcl_jukebox_c418.short_description: Adds 4 new records: "minimal", "krank", "depado", and "phlips", songs all produced by C418 and released under CC-By 3.

news_markdown.short_description: Shows players the server news when they log in

scanner.short_description: Lets you read and write books via digilines

lightning_wand.short_description: A craftable wand that strikes lightning wherever you point it

colordcement.short_description: Add Cement Blocks with unifieddyes support

angledwalls.short_description: Angled & Sloped Walls, Angled Glass, & Angled Doors

artdeco.short_description: This mod just adds some new building blocks to Minetest.

c_doors.short_description: Adds centered doors, and villa style windows to Minetest.

facade.short_description: Adds decorative clay and stone-type nodes to Minetest Game.

stoneworks.short_description: Stoneworks simply adds some fun, and cool building options to Minetest.

resizeme.short_description: Become an Ant or a Giant! Exposes API

solarphases.short_description: Simulate variable daytime lengths, including polar day / night

usable_nodes.short_description: Adds usable nodes, such as kill block, or move block.

catrealm.short_description: Adds a cat-themed dimension with unique ores and over-powered tools

defripper.short_description: Generate inert facades from node/item definitions for use in other games

wc_storage.short_description: Adds More Storage Containers to NodeCore

colorcubes.short_description: This mod contains several colorful abstract blocks for decoration.

doc.short_description: A simple in-game documentation system which enables mods to add help entries based on templates.

xdecor.short_description: A decoration mod meant to be simple and well-featured (libre version).

easy_ores.short_description: Minetest ores now generate higher up

charcoal.short_description: Make charcoal from trees and use this as fuel

nss_helicopter.short_description: It adds an expensive helicopter with power consumption.

titanic_mod.short_description: adds several nodes in the style of the RMS TITANIC

spawn.short_description: Drop-in replacement for default/spawn for more third-party biomes

randomwalker.short_description: 3d Random Walker Blocks that create interesting structures in the world

bug_command.short_description: adds a command that submits a bug report to a github repo.

craftsystem.short_description: craft registration API which automatically deals w/ replacements

inventory_ores.short_description: shows where to find ores in an inventory manager.

modinfo.short_description: get info about the mods running on a server

moreblocks.short_description: adds various blocks to the game

name_monoid.short_description: flexible control of a player's nametag

replacer.short_description: provides a node replacement tool and a node inspection tool. slightly different than the other replacer variants.

scaffolding.short_description: scaffolding, to help in building projects.

toolcap_monoids.short_description: an API to allow multiple sources to apply changes to a tools's capabilities.

railbuilder.short_description: This mod allows you to plan and build tunnels and rails for Advtrains.

minenews.short_description: Display localized server news when a player joins

filterpp.short_description: censors swears in the player chat using the filter++ liberary

classroom.short_description: An easy way to manage students in-game, with support for bulk actions and macros.

bushy_leaves.short_description: Makes leaves render bushy instead of boxy. Now with better performance and Plantlife support.

hide_coords.short_description: Hides coordinates for all players who don't have the "debug" privelege

mcl_decor.short_description: Adds more decoration and furniture blocks to VoxeLibre (ex. MineClone2) and Mineclonia

mcl_emerald_stuff.short_description: Adds emerald tools and armor to VoxeLibre (ex. MineClone2)

tune_jit.short_description: Tunes LuaJIT parameters to improve server performance by preventing constant GC

coloredblocks.short_description: Different colors of: stone, stone bricks, wood obsidian, and glass

elevator.short_description: Smooth entity-based elevators used for vertical transport without teleportation

accuracy.short_description: Accuracy library for mods introducing ranged weapons.

auto_door.short_description: Automatically opens and closes doors for players

blood_splatter.short_description: Blood splatter for players and creatures

cbeds.short_description: This adds 15 hardware colored beds to MTG or changes the beds in Voxelibre

powerguns.short_description: A mod that adds laser guns and a force gun

3d_armor_flyswim.short_description: Adds Flying and Swimming animations to base character model for 3d_armor

discotrains.short_description: Adds colorful subway trains to advanced trains

coop_factions.short_description: Adds factions, allowing players to team together

liquid_physics.short_description: Work in Progress. Adds physics to liquids, such as water physics, or lava physics

country_flags.short_description: Add all country flags to pride_flags

lightning.short_description: A mod that adds thunder and lightning effects.

luscious.short_description: Bring color into the mgv7 mapgen world.

nightandday.short_description: Allows you to have different day and night speeds.

skybox.short_description: Allows changing your sky to unimaginably epic scenes.

warps.short_description: Warp locations and warp stones (portal stones)

yolo.short_description: You Only Live Once - AKA hardcore/permadeath mode - death is permanent.

auth_rx.short_description: Auth Redux is a drop-in replacement for the builtin authentication handler of Minetest

auth_rx_lite.short_description: Robust and lightweight authentication handler for use on servers

beds.short_description: A complete rewrite of the Beds mod with many additional features

formspecs.short_description: ActiveFormspecs is a framework that abstracts the builtin formspec API of Minetest

signs_rx.short_description: Signs Redux is a complete rewrite of default signs that adds many new features

stopwatch.short_description: Stopwatch is Lua-based benchmarking API for Minetest developers

timekeeper.short_description: Timekeeper acts as a centralized dispatcher for all time-sensitive routines

trophies.short_description: Showcase player achievements with a personalized gold cup

advancedban.short_description: Advanced Ban: Ban a player based on its username

gc_gamemode.short_description: Easily switch between the survival and creative inventory

gc_sprint.short_description: A simple sprinting utility without the need for food consumption :^)

mineclonia_chaos.short_description: Random crazy things happen at regular intervals.

subways.short_description: Nice, customizable subways for Advanced Trains (advtrains)

tieless_tracks.short_description: Tracks without crossties for Advanced Trains (advtrains) that can be used on streets and other related things

scramble.short_description: Renames all nodes to a hashed equivalent.

sling.short_description: Sling enables item stack and single item throwing of any item.

chat_tools.short_description: chat commands that people might need

metavectors.short_description: vectors using metatables to make coding easier

modutil.short_description: Providing some utilities that can be used by other mods.

pirate_story.short_description: a story about a wannabe pirate

infinite_wood.short_description: You can now get infinite wood in survival

drop_blacklisted.short_description: "Don't add the specified drop(s) to the inventory when digging"

bridger.short_description: Adds a large number of advanced nodes conducive to building large, industrial bridges.

glass_stained.short_description: Adds fancy and highly adaptable stained glass and spiked iron railing.

slats.short_description: Adds decorative slats that have a lot of uses.

quartz_glass_stl.short_description: Adds quartz-glass combinations for colored glass blocks

cinventory.short_description: helps players access a creative mode like menu for games like nodecore that dont have an inventory system

unifiedbricks.short_description: This mod allows the user to re-color default bricks using Unified Dyes, and provides some pattern variations as well.

liquid_restriction.short_description: restricts liquid use to a privilege

shadowmute.short_description: allows muting and shadow muting players

shadows.short_description: Adds sunlight shadows to your world

terraform.short_description: Work in Progress. Adds terraforming tools to your creative toolbox

wings.short_description: Wings is a mod whiche allows server owners to give players fly privs while holding the wings (Like binoculars) made by xXNicoxx

mese_trains.short_description: Some more trains for the advtrains mod.

advtrains_doc_integration.short_description: Adds certain Advtrains-related items to the documentation system

advancedplaytime.short_description: Keeps track of playtime for all players in your world. Notifies you how much playtime you have occasionally.

edutest.short_description: Provides a GUI frontend for the educational staff.

mobconf.short_description: Place, remove and configure Mobs (for now: NPCs) using chatcommands

cm_drawtextures.short_description: Replacement of default textures, by drawn textures that I draw from scratch

4_bit_n.short_description: 4~8px - Has to small FPSs? That TP helping you!

mtuotp.short_description: A new fresh texture pack to replace the old one.

techage_reskin.short_description: Applies to the Techage Modpack, changing most of its textures to 16px and a different visual style.

rpg16.short_description: A simple texturepack reminiscent of classic RPGs

12345.short_description: Wilhelmines Texture Pack – Inspired by the colors of Nature!

polygonia.short_description: A 256px texture pack created with Blender3D.

plastic_textures.short_description: A simplistic texture pack that portrays the world of Minetest in bright, solid colors and low detail.

progressbar_sword.short_description: Replaces the Loading/Progress Bar with a cool sword.

baunilha.short_description: Fresh and tasty textures with a vanilla flavor

broken_textures.short_description: Reality fractures into a looping anomaly, leaving only a distorted echo of what once was.

standart_textures.short_description: Work in Progress. A 2D texturepack, made with gimp

mtg_tiled_32x.short_description: Minetest Game textures but tiled up to 32x.

ohceedee.short_description: Flat geometrical texture pack inspired by FVDisco's oCd resource pack.

vilja_pix_2.short_description: Featured. A sophisticated texture pack for Luanti.

nice_realistic.short_description: Work in Progress. Realism striving texturepack, that maintains 16px nice style

sharpnet_textures.short_description: It's Photo Realism pack with few mod support.

vearpons.short_description: Changes sword textures into a brand new

default_ls.short_description: The default TP for Minetest Game, using reduced saturation

outline_square_crosshair.short_description: It replaces the + and X crosshair to the outline square crosshair.

ncep9x.short_description: Textures via Pixel Art Scaling Algorithm

wintercore_ornate.short_description: Fancy & Artistic 32x32 Nodecore textures by Wintersknight

retroplus.short_description: Look and feel of the oldest versions of Minetest-c55

refined_textures.short_description: Attempts to recapture a similar aesthetic to "Minecraft", a fork of REFI_Textures to remove all the weird emphasis on cyan colors.

bloopy1_ctf_pack.short_description: A texture pack made by bloopy1 for ctf

drummyfish.short_description: 128 x 128 hand painted style texture pack

tweaks_for_ctf.short_description: Simplistic texturepack for ctf based on WINNI's miner16px made for visibility , performance and good looks .

retro.short_description: A pack for those who like the first mt textures!

farming_cv.short_description: overrides farming_redo's textures w/ the ones from cucina_vegana
